titles.title: Preventing Unjust Red Flag Laws Act of 2023
Preventing Unjust Red Flag Laws Act of 2023
To prohibit funding for the implementation and enforcement of Federal red flag orders.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Preventing Unjust Red Flag Laws Act of 2023
This bill prohibits the use of federal funds to implement or enforce red flag laws. The term red flag law means a risk-based, temporary, and preemptive protective order that authorizes the removal of a firearm without due process.
